1.「…………いってぇーーッ。| やべ アタマ打ったわ……死ぬかも。: Ouch... Oh man, I hit my head...I might die.

2.「ハハッ <pc>っちも| バナナの皮 踏んづけて 転んだのか～。| やっぱ 遊: Hahaha <pc> you also stepped on a|Banana Peel and fell down~? I guess a gadabout|has to step on it, right?

4.「な…なんでやねん！ アホちゃうかァ ワレ！！| そこで バナナの皮で ズッコケ: Why... why? Are you stupid! You said there was|a gadabout who died from falling on his banana|peel!

5.「ワイは 置いてあるモン 取ってこい| 言うたのに なに踏んでんねん！！| おま: I told you to go get the stuff you left|behind, but what are you stepping on? And|you're so fucking stupid!

6.「……チクショーーーッ！| お題を無視するだけやのうて 死をもおそれず| 遊びに: Damn it! Not only do you ignore the subject,|but you are willing to play with death...|Kaku, asshole!<me 71>

7.「おっ！ マジか！| やったな <pc>っち！！| イマドキの遊び人のチカラを: Whoa! You did it! Way to go, <pc>!|You just proved the power of the Trendy|Gadabout!

8.「うふ…… 今回の試練は アナタたちの| 遊び人としての度量を 試していたのだけ: Well... this trial was meant to test your|gadabout skills, but alas, it looks like you|passed...<heart>

9.「……だ…だが まだやでッ！| 試練が ひとつだとは ひと言もゆーてへん！| ま: But not yet! I never said it was just one|trial. I haven't even acknowledged that you're|a true gadabout yet.

10.「ルッチーちゃ～んっ！！| たいへん！！ たいへんなの～っ！！: Lucchie~! Oh my God! Oh my God~!

11.「ゴ…ゴランゾちゃんが……| 労魔デスワークに 襲われたの！！: Golanzo was attacked by Labor Demon Deathwork!

13.「ゴラちゃん……遊びから 戻ってきたと思ったら| 急に 遊び人をやめて 働くんだ:
Gora... she came back from her gadabout and|suddenly she said she was going to stop being|a gadabout and start working, and I didn't|
|know what to do. I don't know what to do...

14.「オイッ！！| アンタたちが 何かしたんじゃねーだろーな！？: Hey! You didn't do something to me, did you?

15.「ハ…ハァ～？ ジョーダンはヨシコさんやで！？| ワイら ずっと この場所におっ: Ha...huh? Jordan is Yoshiko! We've been in|this place the whole time! We can't just|attack our own companion!

16.「疑うのも わかんなくはないけど～| これだけは 信じてほしいの……| アタシた: I understand your doubts, but please believe|me when I tell you that we are not death|work~<heart>

17.「アリバイありってことか。| ……わかった。| アンタたちの言うことを 信じよう: So you have an alibi. Okay. I'll believe you.

19.「えーと ゴラちゃんは……グレン城の| 武器鍛冶ギルドで 働くって言ってたかなぁ: Let's see, Gora-chan...I think she said she|works at the Weaponsmith Guild in Glen|Castle...

20.「<pc>っち…… デスワークに襲われた| ゴランゾのことが とにかく 心配だ。: <pc>... I'm worried about Golanzo who|was attacked by Death Work. Let's go to the|Weaponsmith Guild in Glen Castle.

21.「今日中に……| どうのつるぎ★３を……５００本……| 作らなくては……ブツブツ: I have to make 500 Copper Swords 3... by the|end of the day... mumble mumble mumble... ...

22.「……おいおい ゴランゾ～。| いったい どうしちまったんだよ。| なに こんな: Hey, hey, hey, hey, Golanzo~! What the hell is|wrong with you? What are you doing playing|around here~?

23.「……おや ルッチー氏。| いつも お世話になっております。: ...Oh, Mr. Lucchie. Thank you for all your|help.

24.「ですが ちがいますよ ルッチー氏。| 遊んでいるのではなくて 働いているのです: But no, Mr. Lucchie. I'm not playing, I'm|working. I've stopped being a gadabout.

26.「あっ そうでした……これは 不覚。| 親方に 素材の調達を 頼まれていました。: Oh, that's right...this was an accident. I was|asked by my master to procure materials.

27.「……ということで ルッチー氏。| 今まで お世話になりました。| 私は 仕事で: So, Mr. Lucchie. Thank you very much for all|the help you have given me. I'm busy with|work, so I'll leave you now.

28.「もう イヤ……。| あたしも 遊び人やめる。: I don't want to be a gadabout anymore.

30.「デスワークに 襲われたら……あんなふうに| 自分じゃないみたいに なっちゃうん: If a death work attacked me... it would be|like I wasn't myself, you know? If it was a|gadabout, I'd be taken by him, too.

31.「あたしは ただ みんなと一緒に| 楽しいことをして 遊びたいだけなのに……。|: All I want to do is play and have fun with you|guys, but I can't stand this... I can't take|it anymore!

34.「ほーれ 言わんこっちゃあらへんわァ。| 遊びクラブとやらも 解散やな～。: Well, I won't say it. I guess this play club|will be disbanded.

35.「せやから 遊び人はやめとけ いうたやろ～？| 遊び人なんて ロクなこと ないん:
That's why I told you not to be a gadabout,|remember? Being a gadabout is not a good|thing. Even if you have fun now, you'll regret|
|it later.

36.「そうよ～ アナタだって もう大人でしょ～？| 遊び人だなんて ふざけたことして: That's right~ You're an adult now, aren't you?|Stop playing around like a gadabout and get|real, okay?

37.「そや そや！ 言うたれ！ 遊び人なんてな～| くさった死体にたかる ハエのよう: Yes, yes! Say it! A gadabout is like a fly on|a Walking Corpse! You can stop now!

39.「おいおいおい まさか……| どいつもこいつも 似たようなことばかり| 言いやが: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,|no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,|no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.

40.「アンタたち……ペアレンツ？| ……父ちゃんと 母ちゃんなのか？: You... parents? ...are you father and mother?

41.「ハ…ハァ～！？ ジョーダンはヨシコさんや！| んなワケあらへんわ！！: Ha...huh! Jordan is Yoshiko! There's no way|that's possible!

42.「あはっ ちょっと急用 思いだしちゃったゾ～<heart>| それじゃ バイバ～: I just remembered something urgent~<heart> See you|later...!

48.「アハハハ！ ペアレンツ 遊び人だったんかよ！| つまんねー親だとばっかり 思っ: Ahahaha! Parents, you're such a gadabout! I|thought they were just boring parents, but...|they're really funny!

49.「や…やかましいわ！| これは お前のためを思って| やっていたことなんだぞ！: You're being so... noisy! I was doing this for|your own good!

50.「そうよ！ 遊び人を襲うデスワークの話を知って| あなたの身を案じたから ひと芝:
That's right! When I heard about the death|work attacking gadabouts, I feared for your|safety, so I put on a show to get the gadabout|
|to stop!

51.「……私たちは たしかに 昔 遊び人だった。| だが やみくもに遊びまわっていた:
It's true that we used to be gadabouts. But|one day, while playing around hastily, I fell|on a banana in an Abandoned Castle and hit my|
|head.

52.「なあ ルッチー…… もう一度 問おう。| 私たちの過ちを くり返してほしくない: Look, Lucchie... let me ask you one more time.|I don't want you to repeat our mistakes. Are|you still willing to stop being a gadabout?

53.「……忠告ありがとよ～。でも オレっちは| いつでも ガチで 遊び人やってんだわ:
Thanks for the advice. But I've always been a|real gadabout. I've made up my mind that this|is what I'm going to do for the rest of my|
|life!

54.「それに デスワークのヤローを ぶっ飛ばして| 遊びクラブの仲間を 元に戻す仕事:
Besides, I still have a job to do, which is to|beat the hell out of the Death Workers and get|my play club buddies back together. So I ain't|
|never gonna stop being a gadabout!

55.「そうか…… そこまで言うのならば 仕方ない。| 私たちのふたりの血を 受け継い: Well... if you insist that much, I have no|choice. With the blood of both of us in your|veins, you may be a gadabout by nature.

56.「デスワークを倒す……と言ったな。| ならば 私たちが 現役時代に編みだした|:
You said you were going to defeat death work.|Then let me give you some gadabout tricks we|developed in our working days. It should come|
|in handy.

57.「うおお なんだこれ スゲーッ！！| バイブス アガってきたーーーッ！！: Oh, what the hell is this? Vibes are getting|agitated!

58.ルッチーは 遊び人の必殺技|パルプンテを 習得した！<me 71>: Lucchie has learned the gadabout's special|move, Hocus Pocus!<me 71>

59.「っしゃー！ このチカラで デスワークを| ぶっ飛ばして みんなを 元通りにして: Yes! I'm going to use my powers to blow the|death work out of the water and put everyone|back to normal! Dad, Mom... thank you so much!

60.「<pc>っちも あんがとな！| お礼したいから 遊びハウスまで 来てくれよ。|: Thanks again, <pc>! I want to thank|you, so please come to the Gadabode. I'll see|you soon!

61.「その時……世の無常と 真理の道を悟ってな。| じつは 試練の中にあった 死んだ:
That's when I realized the impermanence of the|world and the way of truth. As it turns out,|the dead gadabouts in the trial were those of|
|us who died as gadabouts.
